text: Hello everyone, is it possible to recreate an editable email template on HubSpot with the attached design. Is it possible to convert each section into a HubSpot email module.

It looks like it may be possible, yes. I wrote a blog post about editable email templates using custom modules that may be helpful for getting started: <https://www.courtneyfantinato.com/custom-HubSpot-email-template/|https://www.courtneyfantinato.com/custom-HubSpot-email-template/>
Thanks Courtney! I'll check your blog post.
